Articles.Content:
I am really exited for this game, the amount of new things that this new engine can bring to the table is OUTSTANDING.
Interstellar Travel, Proper base Building, Easier craft making, Official Multiplayer Support.


Theres just so much that this is going to accomplish that I can't even say it all.

20 hours ago, Dman979 said:

you're excited for! (Only one entry will be counted per person. The purpose of this thread is as a giveaway and to share what you are excited for; off-topic complaints or comments about KSP2 should be posted in the appropriate forum locat

I'm exited to play multiplayer with my friends and make a huge space station!
Colonies and orbital construction, as well as the leap in graphics: I have KSP 1 on console so no mods. Upgraded to PC ready for KSP 2
Please release midnight tonight
I am most hyped about the upcomming colonies feature, setting up automated delivery routes and making KSP2 a kind of management game.
I am very excited for the new parts, and definitely the customizable wings.
I'm excited for the improved graphics and multipayer
I'm liking the prospect of advanced terrain features and new parts.

I'm excited about the franchise KSP itself, the fact that it lives on in a new iteration, which grew with all those amazing mods and which are now there as stock implemenation only for KSP2 to outgrow KSP 1 in a scale noone thought about.
Procedural wings/new aircraft parts!
Good stock clouds!!!!!
Excited to play with friends and learn new things with them.
I am excited about the Multiplayer feature so chaos will ensure even in space
Can't wait to kill Jeb and explain to his family how he died in a 3.7 lightspeed kraken attack
Can't wait to see what kind of awesome mods the community make for ksp2
I'm excited for better lighting/graphics.  I want to make colonies at some point, so can't wait for that feature.
have a try

I am excited for what you'll be able to do on planets and moons now, setting up research outposts and self-sustaining colonies, the PBR recolourable parts, and just how detailed everything looks and hopefully plays. Just the possibility of going interstellar excites me too.

Edited February 23, 2023 by OrdinaryKerman
The sunflare looks nice too, and focusing all flight instruments in one spot is a good change.
Personally, I look forward to the whole space logistics thing.

I am really excited about the part manipulation and adding your own color to the parts which gives you  a unique ship. I am also curious how the detailed planets will look like . Can't wait until the game comes out.

我对殖民地和星际旅行感到兴奋。

[moderator translation]:

I'm excited about Colonies and Star Trek.

Edited February 23, 2023 by Geonovast
translated
I'm very excited to say goodbye to Kraken! Thousand parts ships here we go!

I can't wait to finally have better modding tools and better modding file formats 

 

it's gonna speed up my workflow so much
Super excited for  building planes with the new wing system can't wait to fail over and over again and donate useless funds to the cause of science
Seeing forward to performance upgrades so that we finally can build larger bases and ships without lag.
